title: Extract Form HTML & CSS From Website
snippet:
I have a form in a website I would like to reuse. It's a pop-up contact us form. I don't want it to pop-up. I just want the HTML and CSS so I can paste it into my other sites.

To see the form follow the following link then click "send message": http://filefishstick.com/test/redirect.htm

I want to preserve the spacing, layout, basically the entire client side code for this. I will handle the server side code.
